California state fips code = 06

##filter down
```{r}
nosummaryrows <-irs %>% group_by(y2_countyname) %>% filter(y1_statefips == "6" & y2_statefips !=96 & y2_statefips !=97 & y2_statefips !=98)

```


Just four-county area
